Name: maximize_velocity
Description: Maximize average story points delivered over considered sprints

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the rate at which sprint goals are achieved

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Minimize overall severity of blockers across all tasks

Name: minimize_sprint_backlog_total_effort
Description: Minimize total implementation effort per sprint backlog

Name: minimize_user_story_lead_time
Description: Minimize proxy for user story waiting by focusing on lower status age (status-based proxy)

Name: maximize_feature_priority_delivery
Description: Maximize delivered value by focusing on higher-priority features

Name: minimize_task_rework
Description: Minimize rework by reducing tasks with status changes indicating churn

Name: minimize_meeting_duration
Description: Minimize total time spent in plan/review/retro meetings

Name: minimize_daily_scrum_time
Description: Minimize cumulative daily scrum duration while retaining effectiveness

Name: minimize_project_budget_usage
Description: Minimize total budget consumption while meeting scope

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance_coverage
Description: Maximize alignment with high-relevance stakeholder interests
